import { useState, useContext, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Facebook, Twitter, Mail, GitHub } from 'react-feather' import InputPasswordToggle from '@components/input-password-toggle' import {Col, Row, Card, Table, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, CustomInput, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import classnames from 'classnames' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { handleMaster, handleMasterUpdate } from '@store/actions/masteruser' import axios from 'axios' // import '@styles/base/pages/page-auth.scss' const MasterForm = (props) => { const { register, errors, handleSubmit } = useForm({defaultValues:props ? props && props.preloadValue : ""}) const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmit = data => { alert("SUBMITED SUCCESSFULLY") if ( props && props.preloadValue) { dispatch(handleMasterUpdate(data)) } else { dispatch(handleMaster(data)) } } console.log(props) return (
value !== '' })} placeholder='please enter your name' autoFocus /> setEmail(e.target.value)} className={classnames({ 'is-invalid': errors['login_email'] })} innerRef={register({ required: true, validate: value => value !== '' })} placeholder='john@example.com' autoFocus />
